verses.kjv: Now after the death of Moses the servant of the LORD it came to pass, that the LORD spake unto Joshua the son of Nun, Moses’ minister, saying,
verses.ct: After Moses, the servant of the LORD, died, the LORD spoke to Joshua son of Nun, who had been Moses' assistant.

verses.kjv: Moses my servant is dead; now therefore arise, go over this Jordan, thou, and all this people, unto the land which I do give to them, even to the children of Israel.
verses.ct: "My servant Moses is dead. Now get up and cross the Jordan River — you and all these people — into the land that I am giving to the people of Israel.

verses.kjv: Every place that the sole of your foot shall tread upon, that have I given unto you, as I said unto Moses.
verses.ct: Every piece of ground your foot steps on, I have given to you, just as I promised Moses.

verses.kjv: From the wilderness and this Lebanon even unto the great river, the river Euphrates, all the land of the Hittites, and unto the great sea toward the going down of the sun, shall be your coast.
verses.ct: Your territory will stretch from the desert and from Lebanon all the way to the great Euphrates River, including all the land of the Hittites, and westward to the Mediterranean Sea.

verses.kjv: There shall not any man be able to stand before thee all the days of thy life: as I was with Moses, so I will be with thee: I will not fail thee, nor forsake thee.
verses.ct: No one will be able to stand against you for your entire life. Just as I was with Moses, I will be with you. I will never let you down or abandon you.

verses.kjv: Be strong and of a good courage: for unto this people shalt thou divide for an inheritance the land, which I sware unto their fathers to give them.
verses.ct: Be strong and courageous, because you are the one who will lead these people to take possession of the land that I swore to their ancestors I would give them.

verses.kjv: Only be thou strong and very courageous, that thou mayest observe to do according to all the law, which Moses my servant commanded thee: turn not from it to the right hand or to the left, that thou mayest prosper whithersoever thou goest.
verses.ct: Just be strong and very courageous, making sure to follow all the instructions that my servant Moses gave you. Don't turn away from them in any direction, so that you will succeed wherever you go.

verses.kjv: This book of the law shall not depart out of thy mouth; but thou shalt meditate therein day and night, that thou mayest observe to do according to all that is written therein: for then thou shalt make thy way prosperous, and then thou shalt have good success.
verses.ct: Never stop speaking about this book of the law. Think deeply about it day and night so that you carefully follow everything written in it. If you do this, your path will be successful, and you will prosper.

verses.kjv: Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
verses.ct: Remember, I have given you this command: Be strong and courageous! Don't be afraid or discouraged, because the LORD your God is with you wherever you go."

verses.kjv: Then Joshua commanded the officers of the people, saying,
verses.ct: Then Joshua gave orders to the officers of the people:

verses.kjv: Pass through the host, and command the people, saying, Prepare you victuals; for within three days ye shall pass over this Jordan, to go in to possess the land, which the LORD your God giveth you to possess it.
verses.ct: "Go through the camp and tell the people, 'Get your food ready, because in 3 days you will cross the Jordan River to go in and take possession of the land that the LORD your God is giving you.'"

verses.kjv: And to the Reubenites, and to the Gadites, and to half the tribe of Manasseh, spake Joshua, saying,
verses.ct: To the tribes of Reuben, Gad, and the half-tribe of Manasseh, Joshua said,

verses.kjv: Remember the word which Moses the servant of the LORD commanded you, saying, The LORD your God hath given you rest, and hath given you this land.
verses.ct: "Remember what Moses, the servant of the LORD, commanded you when he said, 'The LORD your God is giving you a place to settle, and he has given you this land.'

verses.kjv: Your wives, your little ones, and your cattle, shall remain in the land which Moses gave you on this side Jordan; but ye shall pass before your brethren armed, all the mighty men of valour, and help them;
verses.ct: Your wives, your children, and your livestock may stay in the land that Moses gave you on this side of the Jordan. But all your fighting men, your strongest warriors, must cross over armed ahead of your brothers and help them,

verses.kjv: Until the LORD have given your brethren rest, as he hath given you, and they also have possessed the land which the LORD your God giveth them: then ye shall return unto the land of your possession, and enjoy it, which Moses the LORD’s servant gave you on this side Jordan toward the sunrising.
verses.ct: until the LORD gives your brothers a place to settle just as he has given you, and they too have taken possession of the land that the LORD your God is giving them. After that, you may return to your own land on the east side of the Jordan — the land that Moses, the servant of the LORD, gave you — and enjoy it."

verses.kjv: And they answered Joshua, saying, All that thou commandest us we will do, and whithersoever thou sendest us, we will go.
verses.ct: They answered Joshua, "Everything you command us, we will do. Wherever you send us, we will go.

verses.kjv: According as we hearkened unto Moses in all things, so will we hearken unto thee: only the LORD thy God be with thee, as he was with Moses.
verses.ct: Just as we listened to Moses in everything, we will listen to you. We only ask that the LORD your God be with you the way he was with Moses.

verses.kjv: Whosoever he be that doth rebel against thy commandment, and will not hearken unto thy words in all that thou commandest him, he shall be put to death: only be strong and of a good courage.
verses.ct: Anyone who rebels against your authority and refuses to listen to whatever you command will be put to death. Just be strong and courageous!"
